metadata.title: CVE-2023-5536 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: A feature in LXD (LP#1829071), affects the default configuration of UbuntuServer which allows privileged users in the lxd group to escalate theirprivilege to root without requiring a sudo password.

criterions.comment: cloud-init: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'mitigation must be performed manually').
subiquity: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'mitigation must be performed manually').
